mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PW, USER_TELL, USER_BIRTH, USER_ADR, USER_DATE FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT CP.COM_NAME , AP.PO_NUM , PT.CAREER , PT.REGION , AP.RE_NUM , AP.RE_TITLE , AP.PO_TITLE , AP.RESULT , AP.AP_DATE , AP.AP_ID FROM APPLY AP, RESUME RE, COMPANY CP, POST PT WHERE RE.USER_ID = #{ user_id } AND AP.RE_NUM = RE.RE_NUM AND AP.PO_NUM = PT.PO_NUM AND PT.COM_ID = CP.COM_ID ORDER BY AP.AP_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLY ( AP_ID, PO_NUM, RE_NUM, RE_TITLE, PO_TITLE, RESULT ) VALUES ( NVL((SELECT MAX(AP_ID) FROM APPLY), 0) + 1, #{ po_num }, #{ re_num }, #{ re_title }, #{ po_title }, #{ result } )
INSERT INTO OFFER ( OF_ID, PO_NUM, RE_NUM, RE_TITLE, PO_TITLE, RESULT ) VALUES ( NVL((SELECT MAX(OF_ID) FROM OFFER), 0) + 1, #{ po_num }, #{ re_num }, #{ re_title }, #{ po_title }, #{ result } )
